first.question: You arrive at the store entrance. What do you do?
answers: You go in through the door
You notice, that you forgot the shopping list at home, so you go to get it and then go through the door
You are afraid to go to store, so you leave

kauppaan sisälle.question: You enter the store. You see the checkout, slot machines, shopping carts, entrance gate and shopping baskets on the other side of the gate.
answers: You walk into the store through the checkout and take the shopping basket with you
You go in through the gate and take the shopping basket with you from the rack
You have a huge shopping list, so you take a cart next to the entrance gate by placing a coin in it and go in through the gate
You go to play on slot machines
You have such a small shopping list that you don’t take a basket or a cart, you just go in through the gate

ostospuolella.question: You tour different departments looking for products on your shopping list. Whenever you find the right product, you put it in your basket / cart. However, you can not find one of the products you want, even though you have searched for it for a long time.
answers: You stop searching for the product completely
You look for a shop assistant and ask him where the product you want is located
You replace the product with something similar as the one you want
You return all the products you have picked up and leave the store

myyjä auttaa etsimään.question: The shop assistant tells you where to find the product you want.
answers: You go pick up the product
You thank the shop assistant and then go pick up the product
You command the shop assistant to pick up the product for you
You ask the shop assistant to come along to make sure you find the product, and you thank him after that

ostokset valittu.question: You have now gone through your entire shopping list. What do you do next?
answers: You exit the store through the entrance gate with your groceries
You go to checkout with your groceries
You put your groceries in your bag and walk past the checkout

pelikoneet 1.question: You play a few coins on slot machines. You lose all the coins you play. What do you do?
answers: You try to make money drop out of the slot machine by kicking it
You continue playing with bigger bets
You go in through the gate to the shopping side and take a shopping basket with you
You take a cart for yourself by placing a coin in it and you walk in through the gate
You go in through the gate

pelikoneet 2.question: You put all of your money into the slot machine. You lose everything once again. What do you do?
answers: You leave the store, and you don't have enough strength to go back to the store today
You try to make money drop out of the slot machine by kicking it
You go to pick up more money from home and go back to the store to spend the money this time on shopping

pelikoneet vartija.question: The guard arrives and tells you to stop immediately.
answers: You continue kicking, causing damage to the slot machine
You apologize and leave the store

portti poistuminen.question: The guard quickly arrives. He advises that groceries must first be paid for at checkout before taking them out of the store. He also says you are not allowed to leave through the entrance gate.
answers: You run away with your groceries
You apologize, you return to the shopping side and go to the checkout

kassa poistuminen.question: The guard quickly arrives. He advises that groceries must first be paid for at checkout before taking them out of the store.
answers: You run away with your groceries
You apologize, you return to the shopping side and go to the checkout

kassalle saapuminen.question:
You reach the checkout. There is no queue in front of you. Your shopping cart is half full. The cashier greets you.
What do you do?
answers: You greet back and put your groceries on the conveyor belt
You say nothing and stand still
You put your groceries on the conveyor belt

ostokset_hihnalla.question:
The cashier starts scanning the groceries. If you have a basket with you, you put it next to the checkout inside the other baskets.
What do you do?
answers: You go to pack the groceries
You wait that all the groceries are scanned, since you only have a small amount of groceries
You start chatting with the cashier
You take a chargeable plastic bag under the checkout, put it on the conveyor belt and wait for the cashier to scan all the products

odotus_jonossa.question:
The cashier asks: "Can I help you?"
What do you do?
answers: You run away
You ask: "What am I supposed to do?"
You let the person behind you go first

ostosten_hinta.question:
The cashier finishes scanning the groceries. Then he tells the total price of the groceries. 
What do you do?
answers: You pay the cashier the price of the groceries in cash
You pay the cashier the price of the groceries with a debit card
You start to bargain for a cheaper price

juttelu_myyjalle.question:
The cashier smiles and talks with you. 
What do you do?
answers: You wait that the cashier gets all the groceries scanned
You get angry at the cashier and start yelling
You smile back and talk until the cashier gets all the groceries scanned

myyja_neuvoo.question:
The cashier says: "Put the groceries from your basket to the conveyor belt so I can scan them. Then you can pay for your groceries."
What do you do?
answers: You run away without your groceries
You put your groceries on the conveyour belt

asiakas_edessa.question:
You look at how the customer in front of you is behaving at the checkout.
What do you do?
answers: You wait until the other customer is ready and then put your groceries on the conveyor belt
You get angry because the customer did not pay for your groceries too and start yelling at him
You are afraid to follow the customer's behaviour so you leave the store

maksu_kateisella.question:
You give the cashier the required amount of money in cash. The cashier thanks you and wishes you a good day. 
What do you do?
answers: You say: "Thank you!" and go to pack up your groceries
You go to pack up your groceries
You stand still
You start chatting with the cashier

maksu_kortilla.question:
You put your debit card in the payment device and enter your pin code. You wait that the payment is ready and pull your card. The cashier thanks you and wishes you a good day. 
What do you do?
answers: You say: "Thank you!" and you go to pack up your groceries
You go to pack up your groceries
You stand still
You start chatting with the cashier

hinnan_tinkiminen.question:
The cashier tells you that you can't bargain in grocery stores, but the groceries must be paid in full price. 
What do you do?
answers: You get angry when the cashier refuses to lower the price and start yelling
You pay the cashier the price of the groceries in cash
You pay the cashier the price of the groceries with a debit card
You get angry and leave the store

vartijan_kutsuminen.question:
The cashier calls the guard to the scene. 
What do you do?
answers: You leave the store infuriated
You apologize for your behavior, promise that it won't happen again and leave the store
You quickly grab your unpaid groceries and run away

pakkaaminen.question: You go to pack your groceries in the bag that you have with you or to the plastic bag, if you put one on the conveyor belt. You get your groceries packed. If you had a cart with you, take it back to where it belongs. What do you do?
answers: You leave the store walking calmly
You run fast out of the store

keskustelu_maksun_jalkeen.question:
The queue behind you seems angry and the cashier looks uncomfortable.
What do you do?
answers: You keep chatting with the cashier
You go to pack your groceries

odotus_kassalla.question:
The cashier asks: "Is everything alright?"
What do you do?
answers: You say that everything is alright and go to pack up your groceries
You ask: "What am I supposed to do next?"
You look at the cashier for a long time silently and go to pack up your groceries

varastaminen.question:
You run away as fast as you can, but the guard catches you. 
What do you do?
answers: You kick and rage
You give back your groceries and apologize for what happened

tormaaminen.question:
When you run fast to exit the store, you run into another person.
What do you do?
answers: You apologize and walk the rest of the way calmly
You keep running and exit the store

myyja_pyytaa_pakkaamaan.question:
The cashier asks you to go packing, because there is a queue of people behind you.
What do you do?
answers: You apologize and go to pack up your groceries
You look at the cashier angrily and go to pack up your groceries
You get angry at the cashier because he doesn't want to talk with you and start yelling

myyja_neuvoo_pakkaamaan.question:
The cashier says: "Your groceries are now paid for, so you can go to pack up your groceries."
What do you do?
answers: You go to pack up your groceries
You are too afraid to pack up your groceries so you leave the store

vartija_soittaa_poliisin.question:
The guard holds you firmly and calls the police.
What do you think?
answers: I made a huge mistake
If I had been a little faster, I would have escaped
I will never go to the grocery store again

vartija_tekee_ilmoituksen.question:
The guard says that this will be reported as a crime.
What do you do?
answers: You get immensely angry because of what the guard said and start raging
You realize that you have made some really bad decisions
You think that you will run faster next time
